BrightBlade,Rage                                                             
                                                                             
        ( BB: Sorry that I never posted yesterday, I was gone 'till late 
last night and couldn't check the posts 'till now.)

* BrightBlade snickered at the Maximal's attempt to harm her but growled at 
Gangon's attempts to save her, she could stand on her own feet...she didn't 
need his help!
She came from behind him and aimed her hot-wired gun at the boulder that 
Tavatron was hiding behind, dust and a shower of pebbles came from the 
impact of her charge.
Before the dust and clouds cleared BrightBlade ran up to the boulder and 
jumped on top of it, she fired her gun down the other side of it, hoping to 
hit the Maximal female.
She laughed...*

" Pathetic Maximal!"

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

* Rage saw the action and movement from only a few hundred metres away, he 
mouth watered at the sight of all those tastey morsels of food standing 
around.
It was almost like a smorgus board!
She moved in swiftly and covered those hundred metres in a few strides, she 
let out a roar that shook the ground as her feet stomped towards the meals.
Rage was SO hungry, her stomach was empty and she was beginning to become 
weak from the lack of food.
But now there was so many of the small meal treats that she knew that she 
would be hungry no more!*
